intro.title: Introduction
paragraphs: Welcome to Asepal (hereinafter referred to as "the App"). We deeply understand the importance of your personal information and are committed to protecting its security. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, share, and protect your personal information, as well as how you can exercise your personal information rights.

Please read and understand this privacy policy in full before using the App. If you do not agree with the content of this privacy policy, please stop using the App immediately. Once you start using the App, it means you have fully understood and agreed to all terms of this privacy policy.

collect.title: Information We Collect
paragraphs: To provide you with services, we may collect the following information:
list: Account Information: When you log in, we collect your login credentials, nickname, avatar, and other necessary information.
Personal Profile: Personal information you actively provide when using the App, such as avatar, gender, etc.
Device Information: Including device model, operating system version, unique device identifiers, etc.
Content Information: Text, images, voice, and other content generated during your use of the App.
Location Information: With your authorization, we may collect your location information to provide related services.
Log Information: Operation logs, service logs, etc., when you use the App.
With your authorization, we may obtain your related information from user authentication, partner service providers, and other third parties to provide better services.
collect.highlight: We only collect your personal information within a legal, legitimate, and necessary scope.

rightsTable.title: Your Personal Information Rights
rows: You have the right to access your personal information we hold
You have the right to request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal information
Under certain circumstances, you have the right to request deletion of your personal information
You have the right to withdraw your consent to personal information processing at any time
Under certain circumstances, you have the right to restrict our processing of your personal information
You have the right to obtain a copy of your personal information and transfer it to other service providers
If you believe our personal information processing violates laws and regulations, you have the right to complain to regulatory authorities
